headline: Hewlett Packard Enterprise Extends AI Reach Into Telecom And Healthcare
summary: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (NYSE:HPE) has partnered with New Zealand telco 2degrees to build a sovereign AI platform focused on locally governed digital infrastructure and data. The company has also launched Generate for Healthcare, an AI offering aimed at easing hospital insurance payment and claims challenges. Both moves extend HPE's AI footprint into regulated markets and healthcare operations, beyond its traditional infrastructure focus. Hewlett Packard Enterprise, trading at $21.52, is...
